CmdLine: pip install psutil pymongo numpy matplotlib python-dateutil PrettyTable mongoengine pyyaml dargparse     && pip install -e git+git://github.com/rueckstiess/mtools.git@develop#egg=mtools     && pip install --no-deps git+git://github.com/srault95/mongodb-tools.git@refresh#egg=mongodbtools     && pip install git+git://github.com/mrsarm/mongotail.git@master#egg=mongotail     && pip install --no-deps git+git://github.com/mongolab/dex.git@master#egg=dex
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: curl -O https://fastdl.mongodb.org/linux/mongodb-linux-x86_64-3.2.7.tgz     && tar -xzf mongodb-linux-x86_64-3.2.7.tgz     && mv mongodb-linux-x86_64-3.2.7/bin/* /usr/local/bin     && rm -rf mongodb-linux-x86_64-3.2.7* /usr/local/bin/mongod /usr/local/bin/mongos
Commands.Name: run
